DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study validate diagnostic performance amplify pretracheal stethoscope ( APS ) detect sedation-related adverse acute respiratory event propofol sedate nonintubated child . To determine sensitivity/specificity positive/negative predictive value APS detect sedation-related adverse acute respiratory event propofol sedate nonintubated child .
DOC.brief_title: The Utility Pretracheal Stethoscope Detecting Respiratory Abnormalities Sedated Children
DOC.criteria: Patients 2 year 18 year age undergoing induction maintenance propofol sedation American Family Children 's Hospital ( AFCH ) Pediatric Sedation Clinic American Society Anesthesiology score ( ASA ) 12 ASA score > 3 Oxygen requirement cardiorespiratory instability Allergy propofol component Patients require propofol sedation outside AFCH Pediatric Sedation Clinic
